description:
'''Blood Ceremony''' is a Canadian [[rock music|rock]] band formed in 2006 in [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]]. Blood Ceremony's style has been described as "flute-tinged witch rock" and their lyrics are filled with black magic imagery and references to classic horror films. Their music has been also characterized as [[hard rock]], [[psychedelic folk]], [[progressive rock]], and [[doom metal]].

The band is fronted by singer/flutist/organist Alia O'Brien, whose flute solos are reminiscent of [[Jethro Tull (band)|Jethro Tull]]'s [[Ian Anderson]]. ''[[Gothamist|Torontoist]]'' has called Blood Ceremony "Toronto's most original band".
